title: Make your system ready for the course

paragraphs.text: And verify your docker installation (versions will be higher)

code.script:
docker --version
Docker version 20.10.11, build dea9396e18

docker-compose --version
docker-compose version 1.29.2

paragraphs.text: Also you neede: java (java 14), npm, and an IDE (Visual Code)

Wurstmeister Install Wurstmeisers DockerCompose file from Instruction video for Wurstmeister.
See here for the code

Or Bitnami's DockerCompose file according to this Instruction video Bitnami.
See here for the code
